title: Energy Minister, Secretary Petroleum Division held meeting with Adnoc company’s delegation
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 3 (APP):Caretaker Minister for Energy Muhammad Ali, Secretary Petroleum on Tuesday held a meeting with a delegation of Adnoc which is the leading diversified energy group owned by Abu Dhabi government.
Mr. Abdulla Qubaisi from Adnoc along with Mr. Emmanuel De Reynies, Global Head of Trading Adnoc were in presence, said  a press release issued here.
Matters pertaining to LNG and crude supply came under discussion during the meeting, it was further said.
Minister Muhammad Ali is engaging with energy giants of the world to capitalize opportunities and cooperation avenues to boost Pakistan’s energy sector.
